ARABIC: فَلَا تَضْرِبُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلْأَمْثَالَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not try to make metaphors for Allah. Allah knows and you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So do not invent similitudes for God. Indeed God knows, and you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So do not strike any similitudes to Allah. Allah knows whereas you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not consider anything equal to God. God knows that which you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore do not ascribe equals to Allah; indeed Allah knows whereas you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So do not give examples on behalf of Allah. Truly, Allah knows and you know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore do not give likenesses to Allah; surely Allah knows and you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So strike not any similitudes for God; surely God knows, and you know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So coin not similitudes for Allah. Lo! Allah knoweth; ye know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not compare God with anyone. God has knowledge, but you have not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Propound not then for Allah similitudes, verily Allah knoweth and ye know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do not draw comparisons for Allah: indeed Allah knows and you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Invent not similitudes for Allah: for Allah knoweth, and ye know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So put not forward similitudes for Allah (as there is nothing similar to Him, nor He resembles anything). Truly! Allah knows and you know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore, do not strike parables for Allah; Allah knows, but you do not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So do not cite the examples for God. God knows, and you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:74] So do not strike any similitude for God, [do not] ascribe to God likenesses and then associate them with Him [in power]. Truly God knows, that there is nothing like Him, and you do not know, this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So coin not similitudes for Allah) do not ascribe sons and partners and co-equals to Allah. (Lo! Allah knoweth) that He has no son or partner; (ye know not) this, congregation of disbelievers.
